entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
